languages.text: "С чего мне гневаться? Зверь чует страх хозяина, вот и скалит клыки. А ты меня боишься, законодержец, как пес — фенрисийского волка".
"Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."
languages.original_text: "С чего мне гневаться? Зверь чует страх хозяина, вот и скалит клыки. А ты меня боишься, законодержец, как пес — фенрисийского волка".

traits.locale_text: "Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."
"Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."
"Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."
"Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."
"Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."

languages.text: 「なぜ怒る必要がある？獣は主人の恐れを察して牙を剥く。そして法の番人よ、お前は俺を恐れている。まるで犬がフェンリスウルフを恐れるようにな」
languages.original_text: "Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ怒る必要がある？獣は主人の恐れを察して牙を剥く。そして法の番人よ、お前は俺を恐れている。まるで犬がフェンリスウルフを恐れるようにな」

languages.text: "Warum sollte ich wütend sein? Das Tier spürt die Furcht seines Meisters, darum fletscht es die Zähne. Und Ihr fürchtet mich, Gesetzeshüter, wie ein Hund den fenrisischen Wolf fürchtet."
languages.original_text: "Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."

traits.locale_text: "Warum sollte ich wütend sein? Das Tier spürt die Furcht seines Meisters, darum fletscht es die Zähne. Und Ihr fürchtet mich, Gesetzeshüter, wie ein Hund den fenrisischen Wolf fürchtet."

languages.text: « Pourquoi m'énerverais-je ? Si l'animal montre les crocs, c'est parce qu'il sent la peur de son maître. Et vous me craignez, gardien de la loi, tout comme les chiens craignent le loup de Fenris. »
languages.original_text: "Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi m'énerverais-je ? Si l'animal montre les crocs, c'est parce qu'il sent la peur de son maître. Et vous me craignez, gardien de la loi, tout comme les chiens craignent le loup de Fenris. »

languages.text: «¿Por qué iba a enfadarme? La bestia percibe el miedo de su amo, por eso muestra los colmillos. Y usted me teme, legislador, así como un perro teme al lobo fenrisiano».
languages.original_text: "Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué iba a enfadarme? La bestia percibe el miedo de su amo, por eso muestra los colmillos. Y usted me teme, legislador, así como un perro teme al lobo fenrisiano».

languages.text: “我有什么可生气的呢？那只畜生感觉到了主人的恐惧，于是露出了獠牙。是你在惧怕我，执法者，就像狗惧怕芬里斯狼一样。”
languages.original_text: "Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."

traits.locale_text: “我有什么可生气的呢？那只畜生感觉到了主人的恐惧，于是露出了獠牙。是你在惧怕我，执法者，就像狗惧怕芬里斯狼一样。”

languages.text: "Neden kızayım? Sahibinin korkusunu hissediyor hayvan. Asıl sen, Fenris kurdundan korkan köpekler gibi korkuyorsun benden."
languages.original_text: "Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."

traits.locale_text: "Neden kızayım? Sahibinin korkusunu hissediyor hayvan. Asıl sen, Fenris kurdundan korkan köpekler gibi korkuyorsun benden."

languages.original_text: "Why should I be angry? The beast senses his master's fear, so he bares his fangs. And you fear me, lawkeeper, as a dog fears the Fenrisian wolf."
